definitions.definition: the act or process of measuring:
examples: The test is based on the measurement of blood levels.

definitions.definition: a value, discovered by measuring, that correponds to the size, shape, quality, etc. of something:
examples: The measurements of both rooms were identical.

definitions.definition: Your measurements are the sizes of various parts of your body, especially your chest, waist, and hips, that you refer to when you want to buy clothes.
